sentence.Network_en: A method was established for the determination of Huluba saponin B from Trigonella foenum - graecum L.

【摘要】:为了研究零陵香(Lysimachia foenum-graecum Hance)的化学成分,将零陵香用70%乙醇提取,采用多种色谱方法进行分离纯化,得到了一个黄酮类成分,根据化合物的.
